name: League DAO
description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

en.name: League DAO
en.description: League DAO is combining the best of DeFi protocols, play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native LEAG token.

fr.name: League DAO
fr.description: League DAO combine le meilleur des protocoles DeFi, des jeux play-to-earn et des NFT pour créer un jeu fantastique Web3 où les utilisateurs peuvent posséder et échanger les joueurs de leur équipe et où le score on-chain est basé sur des statistiques du monde réel . Les utilisateurs peuvent participer à la gouvernance du protocole par le biais du jeton natif LEAG.
